Description: --> Dean V 79 Flame Top Electric Guitar (Trans Black) Used This item is slightly used and has been thoroughly checked out by our experts to make sure it is in perfect working condition. We then re-sealed it in its original packaging with all factory included accessories. This item is guaranteed to be in "as new" condition and has virtually no cosmetic imperfections. This item is covered with a one year warranty from Sam Ash. The Dean V 79 Flame Top Electric Guitar offers their own spin on a familiar body shape. Featuring a killer mahogany body with your choice of a Trans Black or Trans Brazilia finish on a flame maple top, the V 79 is ready for the stage right out of the gate. The mahogany neck is set into body for unmatched sustain while the fast thin neck contour and ebony fretboard with 22 Jumbo frets deliver peerless playability from the 1st fret to the last. Metal players will love the total ease and playability of the Dean V 79.The Dean V 79 sports a pair of rock-approved DMT Design Humbuckers that will deliver that massive tone you crave. The simplified controls feature a master tone control, independent volume controls, and a 3-way pickup selector toggle switch. Rounding out the chrome hardware is a set of Grover tuners and an adjustable Tune-O-Matic bridge paired with a string-thru body design for maximum tuning stability and sustain. The Dean V 79 is an affordable weapon of choice for aspiring metal-gods everywhere.
